alert.note: Alert for Attala; Leake; Madison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 7:25PM CDT until April 13 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Leake County in central Mississippi... Southern Attala County in central Mississippi... Northeastern Madison County in central Mississippi... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 725 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Pickens to near Goshen Springs, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Newport around 735 PM CDT. Thomastown around 740 PM CDT. Smyrna, Singleton, Tuscola and Renfroe around 750 PM CDT. Zama around 755 PM CDT. Madden around 800 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Lena, Walnut Grove, Redwater and Standing Pine. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
